00014 class TopdocsIndex {
00015 private:
00016   struct Entry {
00017   public:
00018     struct document_less {
00019       bool operator () ( const Entry& one, const Entry& two ) const {
00020         return one.documentID < two.documentID;
00021       }
00022     };
00023 
00024     struct score_less { 
00025       bool operator () ( const Entry& one, const Entry& two ) const {
00026         double oneScore = double(one.count) / double(one.length);
00027         double twoScore = double(two.count) / double(two.length);
00028         
00029         return oneScore < twoScore;
00030       }
00031     };
00032 
00033     struct score_greater { 
00034       bool operator () ( const Entry& one, const Entry& two ) const {
00035         double oneScore = double(one.count) / double(one.length);
00036         double twoScore = double(two.count) / double(two.length);
00037         
00038         return oneScore > twoScore;
00039       }
00040     };
00041 
00042     Entry( int d, int c, int l )
00043       :
00044       documentID(d),
00045       count(c),
00046       length(l)
00047     {
00048     }
00049 
00050     Entry() {}
00051 
00052     int documentID;
00053     int count;
00054     int length;
00055   };
